title: Hear a siren after a kill in ARAM [HAVE THE WATCHERS RETURNED]

replies.body:
The one shopkeeper does say "That howling noise, is just the wind... isn't it?" - Perhaps you heard a fragment of him saying that?

Plus, I think there's something wrong with Corki's package. That came out wrong. So did that.

But for real though, I think Corki's siren sound effect is just going nuts due to a bug

This could be completely true... unless corkis package appears when hes not in game.... its happened 3 times already, and its anoying, the first time it happeneed, there was a corki, so i shrugged it off. But the next 2 times, there was no corki in sight... so unless the bug is so strong it transends games, it must be something new is comiiing
I second this, I heard it near continuously on Summoner's Rift with a game with Corki on my team.
Was this your game as Master Yi in ARAM? 'Cause if it was, you were ACTUALLY hearing Corki's Siren. It glitches out pretty often and plays at random.
I thought it was Corki's package....
Did you have a Corki in the game? If yes, it's from his passive. If no, well shit.
It is Corki's new passive sound. lol

Again a corki sound effect bug. Its real damn annoying lol
previously we had this infinite machine gun sound bug

Unless they fixed it since like last week we still have the machine gun one too. I couldn't believe it when I heard it again that after all this time and all the marksman updates that still hasn't been fixed.

Looks like it was just a Corki bug then. That's disappointing.
Unless that's what they want us to believe...
Thanks tho guys

Steve is that you?
We warned you what would happen if you did this, I think you better come in and have a chat with us.
Guys, we can't post anything on this thread or they'll know we're onto them! They'll delete our accounts and... oh sht...
